TEXT.English: You'll see options, even if they're not available to you.
TEXT.French: Vous verrez toutes les réponses possibles lors d'évènements, même lorsqu'elles ne vous sont pas accessibles.
TEXT.German: You'll see options, even if they're not available to you.
TEXT.Italian: You'll see options, even if they're not available to you.
TEXT.Spanish: You'll see options, even if they're not available to you.

TEXT.English: Automated Workers Will Not Construct Forts
TEXT.French: Les ouvriers automatisés ne construiront pas de forts
TEXT.Italian: Automated Workers Will Not Construct Forts
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Workers Will Not Construct Forts

TEXT.English: Automated Workers will be unable to construct Forts.
TEXT.French: Ouvriers automatisés - ne pas construire de forts
TEXT.German: Automatisierte Arbeiter sind nicht in der Lage, Forts zu errichten.
TEXT.Italian: Automated Workers will be unable to construct Forts.
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Workers will be unable to construct Forts.
